item.title: By: bfp
item.dc:creator: bfp
item.description:
It's a return to "second best" form for Jordan.
The "best" being the first two books, second best being the "wade through and all the excitement will happen at the end and be mildly interesting" and the bottom of the barrel form being just about everything from book six onwards. Too many threads, too many women, too much boredom.
item.content:encoded:
It’s a return to “second best” form for Jordan.

The “best” being the first two books, second best being the “wade through and all the excitement will happen at the end and be mildly interesting” and the bottom of the barrel form being just about everything from book six onwards. Too many threads, too many women, too much boredom.

item.title: By: MartinG
item.dc:creator: MartinG
item.description:
The "it's a little too much effort" zone is a definition of my (physical) state of being...
So, you enjoyed the dead mammoth installment :)?
item.content:encoded:
The “it’s a little too much effort” zone is a definition of my (physical) state of being…

So, you enjoyed the dead mammoth installment :)?
